title: Marcelline, Illinois
text:
Marcelline is an <a href="unincorporated%20community">unincorporated community</a> in northwest <a href="Ursa%20Township%2C%20Adams%20County%2C%20Illinois">Ursa Township</a>, <a href="Adams%20County%2C%20Illinois">Adams County</a>, <a href="Illinois">Illinois</a>, United States.
Marcelline is located on <a href="Illinois%20Route%2096">Illinois Route 96</a> four miles north of <a href="Ursa%2C%20Illinois">Ursa</a> and five miles south of <a href="Lima%2C%20Illinois">Lima</a>. <a href="Bear%20Creek%20%28Illinois%20stream%29">Bear Creek</a> flows past approximately two miles to the north.
